title: McDonalds Silverstream
description: My part-time job while I was studying. I learned how to work and learn fast under pressure. I made some great friends here and felt like an old man when my coworkers asked me what life is like after high school.

title: Inland Revenue Upper Hutt
description: My first full-time job after completing my Bachelor of Software Engineering in 2023. Although the role is not tech orientated, I have become the IT person for my team and become our offices point of contact for our IT team in the Wellington office. I help a wide range of customers with their tax issues.
